title: Campaign asks groups, individuals to pledge to stay at home
description: DETROIT (AP) — Some small business owners and grassroots organizers in Michigan are hoping to encourage people to stay at home for at least 15 consecutive days to help slow the spread of the COVID-19 virus.
content:
DETROIT (AP) Some small business owners and grassroots organizers in Michigan are hoping to encourage people to stay at home for at least 15 consecutive days to help slow the spread of the COVID-19 virus.
The #ShutItDown! Stop the Spread campaign was started… [+979 chars]
